file_content.text: Theron to strike team. Sensors show Imperial forces entrenched all the way to the Jedi Temple.
Sensors show some kind of shielding around the Jedi Temple Library--the Imps must be up to something in there.
Imps have sliced the defensive shield grid--they're cutting off our approach vectors.
Theron to wave two. Welcome to Korriban. You'll need to traverse the Wilds up ahead to reach the Sith Academy.
Imperial defenders have a barricade up ahead. There's no time to go around--you'll have to break through.
The Dark Council chambers are on the upper levels. You'll need to access the main elevator to reach them.
Wave one managed to soften the Imps up a bit, but you've still got your work cut out for you. Good luck.
The Sith Academy isn't far now. Keep it up.
We don't have much intel on the upper-level defenses--be ready for some heavy opposition.
Enemy artillery is going to make any large-scale deployments very messy. See what you can do to fix that.
When you reach the command platform, try to clear out the enemy forces and open things up for the next wave of reinforcements.
Track the shield power back to its source and shut it down, then see what's going on.
